title: Apple retail fight to organize kicks off as Atlanta workers becomes first to file for union vote
content:
After 9to5Mac reported this weekend that the NYC Apple Store employees started the process toward unionizing, it seems that a retail location in Atlanta will become the first in the U.S. to file a union election, per a report.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple retail fight to organize kicks off as Atlanta workers becomes first to file for union vote appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: An Apple Store in Atlanta plans to become the first in the US to file a union election, according to a report by Bloomberg Laws.
